lead_paragraph: José Mourinho, who led Chelsea to consecutive English Premier League titles in 2005 and 2006, quit as manager yesterday, one day after the team was held to a 1-1 tie by Rosenborg in its Champions League opener.
snippet: José Mourinho, who led Chelsea to consecutive English Premier League titles in 2005 and 2006, quit as manager yesterday, one day after the team was held to a 1-1 tie by Rosenborg in its Champions League opener.
